thread.title: Serena Williams and Drake: Why he won’t marry her or any woman
thread.title_full: Serena Williams and Drake: Why he won’t marry her or any woman

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Serena Williams and Drake: Why he won’t marry her or any woman
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Los Angeles, October 8 (CINEWS): Drake knows how to talk a defining moment, however where it counts inside, he is just a mother’s kid. Actually, the main way the 26-year-old would ever propose to his reputed sweetheart, Serena Williams, 34 — or whatever another lady beside — is whether she was mother affirmed, HollywoodLife.com has EXCLUSIVELY learned. In any case, shockingly for the tennis star, she’s not exactly there yet. 
“Sandi is the first and final lady in Drake’s life,” a source EXCLUSIVELY tells HollywoodLife.com. “Furthermore, in her psyche, no lady is adequate to wed her child. That is a reason why Drake has duty issues. [Sandi] has been pumping up his inner self since the day he was conceived, letting him know how “immaculate” and how “astonishing” he is. 
So what sort of lady does he require? Since his self-image is presently on top of the world, Drake really trusts that “the main lady he could wed and resolve to is one from a fiction novel,” as per our sources. Be that as it may, it might be the ideal opportunity for his sense of self and his mother to step aside, in light of the fact that her infant kid can’t keep his eyes, hands, and lips off of Serena starting late. 
Just before the U.S. Open back in August, Serena and Drake were spotted pressing on some really substantial PDA at an eatery in Cincinnati. The two were all over the place playing so as to observe Serena’s win a little tonsil hockey, and fortunate for us, there are photographs of their provocative festivals. From that point forward, the two have been one another’s greatest supporters. Drake was seen sitting in the group of onlookers amid Serena’s tragic misfortune in the semi-finals at the U.S. Open on Sept. 11, and in addition at her New York Fashion Week appear.
